tools.name: cosmos_send_tokens
tools.description: Send Cosmos-SDK bank tokens from the configured wallet on a specific chain to another address on the same chain, respecting ALN/cybernetic/biophysical policies.

toAddress.description: Bech32 recipient address on the same chain.

amount.description: Token amount in base units (e.g. ualn, boot, uorg, ubio, afet).

denom.description: Token denomination allowed by policy for that chain.

humanApproved.description: True if a human has explicitly approved this transfer (required above certain thresholds).

tools.name: cosmos_ibc_transfer
tools.description: Perform an IBC token transfer between two Cosmos-style chains in the Neuro-IBC zone set, subject to ALN and biophysical/spectral safety policies.

destinationChain.description: Logical destination chain name from the same set.

sourceChannel.description: IBC channel identifier on the source chain (e.g. 'channel-0').

toAddress.description: Recipient address on the destination chain.

timeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for the IBC transfer.

memo.description: Optional memo for the IBC packet.

humanApproved.description: Whether a human has explicitly approved this cross-chain movement.

biophysicalAsset.description: True if this transfer is associated with a biophysical or biotech asset; used to enforce stricter rules.

cyberneticAsset.description: True if this transfer is associated with a cybernetic or neuro-spectral asset; used to enforce stricter rules.

tools.name: cosmos_governance_vote
tools.description: Submit a governance vote on a target chain (e.g. ALN, Bostrom, Organichain, Biotech) with explicit policy tags for cybernetic/biophysical/spectral impact.

memo.description: Optional memo for the vote transaction.

tags.description: Tags describing proposal domain; used for ALN/cybernetic/biophysical policy evaluation.

requiresHumanApproval.description: If true, the host must obtain human approval before submitting vote.
